topic.title: Psychiatric college piece.
topic.body:
I'm going to be working on a paper/presentation for a few dozen people wherein I include personality disorders such as Narcisism, avoidant, histrionic and schizotypal. I'm looking for footage or articles from (online) news related to these disorders, since a large group of people needs some distraction in the form of images after listening to somebody speak for about 15-20 minutes.

Any thoughts, ideas or tips?
